short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension counts the number of setllements in each quadrant for Kindgdom Builder games on BoardGameArena.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a collapsable quadrant counter above the player boards. It shows how many of each settlement color are in each quadrant. This is useful for games that involve the Lords or Farmers scoring objectives because it eliminates the need to manually count settlements in each quadrant.
